title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 661.20 - Approval by the commission
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 661.20 - Approval by the commission

State Regulations

Whenever the phrases "with the permission of the
commission, with the approval of the commission, approved by the commission, authorized by the commission, or directed by the commission," are used herein, such permission, approval, authorization, or direction must be specific and in
writing. The commission may delegate its authority to permit, approve, authorize or direct to a designee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
661.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
